mainFeaturedBlogPost.title: There and back again: Refactoring OO to FP
mainFeaturedBlogPost.preview: Functional programming(FP) seems to be completely in vogue these days. While I do think FP has many benefits, I often have a hard time with what sometimes seems to me a dogmatic comparison that FP is superior than object oriented (OO) programming.
mainFeaturedBlogPost.author: Sam Hall
